task.title: How we're paying for Spring Break
task.shortdesc: We want to spend as little as possible for this trip because we are broke college students

taskbody.context: We are splitting the driving and the room between five people

step.cmd: All of the gas needed to get to Key West and to get back will be split 5 ways
We are also all splitting the cost of the hotel room in Titusville, Fl.
We went to Walmart before the trip to buy groceries for the trip so that we don't have to eat every meal out.
